title: 如何ban工业物品
author: zh512968076
txt_content: 给我举个列子  如何ban工业TNT

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
用这个插件，把要ban的物品拿在手上，输  /bi add f:inv c:t

https://ci.uraniummc.cc/job/BanItem/

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-865052-1-1.html

replies.author: tangxian
replies.txt_content:
下办东西的插件
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-865052-1-1.html
拿在手上输入/banitem add
